episodes.title: TLC's Big Family, Big City | From the Cult Frying Pan into the Fire?
episodes.description:
Hello.  In today's video, I will be discussing the newest TLC show - Big Family, Big City.  This "reality" show features the De La Mottes family.  Amber and Marc have 11 children.  The parents say they left a "cult" after a long time and now are pursuing their children's dreams.  Did they leave their cult mentality behind or did they bring it with them?  Thank you for watching. ~Gina xo

Thank you so much for watching.  If you enjoyed this video, I hope that you will consider liking, commenting, and subscribing.  I would truly appreciate it.

People magazine article
https://people.com/big-family-big-city-s-amber-and-mark-de-la-mottes-struggle-with-dire-financial-situation-while-spending-12k-on-nyc-rent-11687305
